name: MVC Definition
description: Also known as, model–view–controller, MVC is three connected elements that describe the flow of designing a user-interface.

name: What is Node
description: Node is a server side environment that is used to create fully functional applications.

name: Describing Web API's
description: API stands for Application Programming Interface. There are web, browser and server api's that extend the functionality of the web, browser and server.
